author: Justin Vallejo, Justin Vallejo
title: Facebook to direct users who interact with 'harmful' coronavirus misinformation to WHO
description: Agency under review for spreading China's harmful coronavirus misinformation
content:
Facebook will steer users engaging in coronavirus discussion flagged as harmful toward the defunded World Health Organisation (WHO), the company has announced.
It was the latest in a series of moves by Silicon Valley tech giant to engineer public conversatio… [+3230 chars]
